function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Develop and implement data collection strategies, conduct empirical research to validate the framework","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thorough assessment of real estate portfolios, identification of modification indicators, implementation of workplace redesign for social distancing","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Training and awareness programs for employees, adoption of specific risk control approaches , building system assessment and adaptation, personal hygiene education","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting interviews online to eliminate the risk of in-person transmission, implementing strict safety measures if in-person interviews are necessary.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring and adhering to public health guidelines for workplace interactions, testing and quarantine protocols for interviewees from different locations.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing a validation process at the end of each interview to confirm accuracy and completeness of information, cross-referencing interview data with other sources for accuracy.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing comprehensive risk management strategies, addressing major implementation factors, creating flexible workplace plans","category":"Maintaining communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement flexible work policies, invest in remote work technology","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversify project types, establish remote project management capabilities","category":"Maintaining communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement remote work policies, social distancing measures, and regular sanitization protocols.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct modifications during off-peak hours, enforce strict health and safety protocols during modifications, and limit the number of workers present during modifications.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide ergonomic assessments and guidelines for remote work setups, offer virtual health and wellness programs, and maintain regular communication to address employee concerns.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide training and support for remote work, monitor work performance regularly","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing a comprehensive plan for office redesign with a focus on long-term safety and health requirements","category":"Maintaining communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balancing soft renovation with essential building service system refurbishment","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement clear social distancing guidelines and use technology for monitoring compliance","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular health and safety inspections, provision of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide necessary equipment, establish clear communication channels, and offer mental health support services","category":"Maintaining communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Providing training and education on risk management for workplace operations","category":"Staff training / control activities office re-configuration","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enforce and monitor compliance with community measures through regular audits and
